AVDSW1.name: 4-Port Switch HDMI
AVDSW1.features: Allows connecting up to four HDMI A/V sources to an HDMI display. Switch between sources using remote or front panel buttons. Supports high-quality video, various resolutions including 3D and deep colors, Dolby True HD, DTS HD Master Audio, up to 60 Hz refresh rate, long-distance transmission up to 15 m, bidirectional RS-232 control, automatic power-on detection, plug-and-play, HDCP compliant, 1080p support, all-metal casing, LED source indication. An affordable solution to add four HDMI inputs to your home theater system.
AVDSW1.description: The VS481A 4-port HDMI switch allows you to quickly and easily share your HDMI display device with 4 HDMI input sources. The VS481A allows convenient switching between digital devices such as DVD players, satellite receivers, digital camcorders. The VS481A allows you to select the desired input source via a remote control and push buttons on the switch.

AVDSW2.name: 8-Port HDMI Switch
AVDSW2.features: Allows connecting up to four HDMI A/V sources to an HDMI display. Switch between sources using remote or front panel buttons. Supports high-quality video, various resolutions including 3D and deep colors, Dolby True HD, DTS HD Master Audio, up to 60 Hz refresh rate, long-distance transmission up to 15 m, bidirectional RS-232 control, automatic power-on detection, plug-and-play, HDCP compliant, 1080p support, all-metal casing, LED source indication. An affordable solution to add four HDMI inputs to your home theater system.
AVDSW2.description: The VS481A 4-port HDMI switch allows you to quickly and easily share your HDMI display device with 4 HDMI input sources. The VS481A allows convenient switching between digital devices such as DVD players, satellite receivers, digital camcorders. The VS481A allows you to select the desired input source via a remote control and push buttons on the switch.

AVDAM1.name: Matrix Switch HDMI
AVDAM1.features: Connects 2 HDMI sources to 2 HDMI displays. Supports various resolutions including 4K, 3D, and deep colors. HDCP 1.4 compliant. Max data rate of 10.2 Gbps (3.4 Gbps per channel). Long-distance transmission up to 15 meters. Multiple control methods - front panel buttons, IR remote, RS-232 control. Consumer Electronics Control (CEC) for device communication. EDID Expert™ for optimal settings. HDMI Lock Pro™ supported. All-metal casing, firmware upgradable, rack-mountable.
AVDAM1.description: The VM0202H is a 2x2 HDMI matrix switch that supports HDMI features like 3D, Deep Color up to 12 bits, and data rates up to 10.2 Gbps. It's designed for high-definition video switching, supporting computer and video signals up to 4K resolutions.

AVDAM2.name: Matrix Switch HDMI 4*4
AVDAM2.features: Connect any of the 4 HDMI sources to any of the 4 HDMI displays. Supports 4K resolutions up to UHD (3840 x 2160) and DCI (4096 x 2160) with refresh rates of 30 Hz (4:4:4) and 60 Hz (4:2:0). EDID Expert™ optimizes settings for smooth power-on, high-quality display, and best video resolution across different screens. Control through front panel buttons, IR remote, and RS-232. Supports Dolby True HD and DTS HD Master audio. Signaling rate up to 3.4 Gbps for flawless 4K output. HDMI compatible (3D, Deep Color, 4K) and HDCP 1.4 compliant. Consumer Electronics Control (CEC) enables interconnected HDMI devices to communicate using a single remote. Supports ATEN's HDMI LockPro™ for secure cable connections. ESD protection for HDMI. Firmware upgradable, rack-mountable (1U design).
AVDAM2.description: The ATEN VM0404HA 4x4 4K HDMI Matrix Switch supports 4K UHD (3840 x 2160) and DCI (4096 x 2160) resolutions with refresh rates of 30 Hz (4:4:4) and 60 Hz (4:2:0). It's designed for future-proof high-definition video switching and is suitable for applications like classrooms, auditoriums, and large venues where 4K signal routing is essential.

AVCONVERTER1.name: DVI to VGA Converter
AVCONVERTER1.features: Converts analog VGA signals to DVI output. Multi-platform support for Windows and Mac. Supports dual power sources - VGA port or power adapter (in case VGA port can't provide sufficient power). Intelligent video display - image quality is optimized based on the available resolution of the output device.
AVCONVERTER1.description: The VC160A is a VGA to DVI converter that allows you to display VGA source data on a DVI output display. It's powered by both the VGA port and a power adapter. The VC160A is compact, flexible, and easy to set up without requiring any software. It supports a wide range of resolutions for a more enjoyable video experience.

AVCONVERTER2.name: USB-C to VGA Adapter
AVCONVERTER2.features: Transfer high-quality videos from a USB-C compatible laptop or smartphone to a VGA display or projector at 1920 x 1200 resolution and 60 Hz. The premium casing resists signal interference and provides thermal isolation. Compact and lightweight design. Compatible with major operating systems including Windows®, OS X®, 3rd generation iPad Pro, and Android.
AVCONVERTER2.description: The UC3002A is a USB-C to VGA adapter that allows you to transfer video from your USB-C-equipped laptop, tablet, computer, or smartphone to a VGA display or projector. It supports high video resolutions up to 1920 x 1200 at 60 Hz, enabling you to scale your display output to a larger monitor or deliver presentations through a projector.

KVMSWITCH1.name: Swicth KVMP
KVMSWITCH1.features: Superior video quality: Supports 480i, 480p, 720p, 1080i, and 1080p (HDTV)/1920 x 1200 (DVI) resolutions. Power-On Detection. If one of the computers is powered off, the CS1794 will automatically switch to the next powered-on computer. Supports widescreen resolutions. Multiplatform support: Windows, Linux, and Mac. Console mouse port emulation/bypass feature supports most mouse drivers and multifunction mice. DynaSync™ Video: Stores console monitor's Extended Display Identification Data (EDID) to optimize display resolution. Full keyboard emulation for error-free boot-up. Mac keyboard support and emulation. Auto-scan mode to monitor all connected computers and HDMI devices.
KVMSWITCH1.description: Aten CS1794 4-Port USB HDMI/Audio KVMP Switch

KVMSWITCH2.name: Switch KVMP hybride
KVMSWITCH2.features:
A USB keyboard, mouse, and DisplayPort monitor control two DisplayPort computers and a USB-C device.
Superior video quality - 4096 x 2160 at 60 Hz and 3840 x 2160 at 60 Hz; 2-port USB 3.1 Gen 1 hub with SuperSpeed 5 Gbps data transfer rate.
Provides USB 3.0 power to the USB-C device for charging up to 45W.
Computer selection via push buttons, keyboard shortcuts, mouse, and remote port selector.
KVMSWITCH2.description: Switch KVMP hybride DisplayPort USB-C 3 ports CS1953

KVMCABLE1.name: Kit console KVM USB
KVMCABLE1.features: ATEN's CV211 is a USB KVM console adapter designed specifically for frustrated mobile IT managers. It serves as the ideal replacement for emergency carts, transforming your laptop into a KVM console that combines the functionalities of a wormhole switch, a capture box, an external DVD-ROM, a keyboard, a mouse, and a monitor, all within a compact and convenient unit. You're free to diagnose and troubleshoot servers, ATMs, or point-of-sale systems quickly and professionally with ease.
KVMCABLE1.description: ATEN's CV211 is a USB KVM console adapter designed specifically for frustrated mobile IT managers. It serves as the ideal replacement for emergency carts, transforming your laptop into a KVM console that combines the functionalities of a wormhole switch, a capture box, an external DVD-ROM, a keyboard, a mouse, and a monitor, all within a compact and convenient unit. You're free to diagnose and troubleshoot servers, ATMs, or point-of-sale systems quickly and professionally with ease.

KVMCABLE2.name: KVM Cable USB 3M
KVMCABLE2.features:
PC connector: HDB and USB console connector: 3in1 SPHD (keyboard/mouse/video).
Length: 3 m.
With integrated PS/2 to USB converter
KVMCABLE2.description: The 3M USB KVM Cable with 3-in-1 SPHD and Integrated PS/2 to USB Converter 2L-5203UP from Aten

CASQUE.name: Bluetooth Headphones
CASQUE.features:
Bluetooth/Wired connection.
Up to 50 hours of battery life during use.
Lightweight design delivering powerful sound.
40mm drivers for detailed and potent audio.
Long-wear comfort.
Available in Black, Red, and White.
CASQUE.description:
W800BT Bluetooth 4.0 Headset and Wired Function:Bluetooth/Wired connection.
Up to 50 hours of battery life during use.
Lightweight design delivering powerful sound.
40mm drivers for detailed and potent audio.
Long-wear comfort.
